children.text: Select the preferred shape view from framed or stacked layout, decorate the icon background, set connector style to classic and create an amazing look
Use its Fantastic Layout to enhance your Design and make it really attractive to your Audience
Add as many Feature Items as you want. You can insert an Icon or an Image for each of the Item.
Show the Connector between each Icons and give the whole layout an unique design.
Easily personalize every aspects of EA Feature List that you are showcasing on your website.
